A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Despite looking good on screen and doing well as a movie on its own\, Rian Johnson often forgets the movie he is directing and writing is a Star Wars movie\, and in subverting audience expectations derails entire characters and personalities\, and commits the greatest flaw a sequel or interquel can ever commit - not advancing the plot. That's the main problem\, really. Admittedly\, as a single film\, it is nice\, but as the Star Wars film and as a follow-up and a bridge to the upcoming Rise of Skywalker\, it fails at its job on a mind-blowing level.
